Text: Thanks again, catflap, for taking the time to share this with the rest of us. I'm trying to limit myself to only one episode per week (it's hard) and I am especially enjoying the vintage TV commercials that you are including.

I know. When I have a boxset, I have to watch
all eps in a row. And when I download a weekly
show, I don't watch any of them until I have
them all.
